org.arl.fjage.shell

Class GetFileReq

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.Message
      • org.arl.fjage.shell.GetFileReq
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GetFileReq
extends Message
    Request to read a file or a directory. If the filename specified represents a directory, then the contents of the directory (list of files) are returned as a tab separated string with: filename, file size, last modification time. The time is represented as epoch time (milliseconds since 1 Jan 1970).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
